content: Investments Stocks Asked by AnonymousAsked on 05 May 2019What will happen to our stock if they are delisted from SGX? Will we be forced to sell it off?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Ang Yee Gary, Medicine at National University Of SingaporeLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 06 May 2019There are 2 scenario
Company buy Yr shares
Company don't buy Yr sharesIn the first scenario, u get some returns from selling Yr sharesIn the second scenario u become a shareholder in a private company and it would be difficult for you to sell your shares.0 comments0
